tool_description: A real-time feed of the pages currently growing in popularity on the Acrostic.me website.
name: Acrostic.Me Trending
title: Acrostic.Me Trending

api_list.name: Get List of Trending Pages
api_list.description: A real-time feed of the latest 20 pages that are growing in popularity on the Acrostic.me website.

required_parameters.name: time_filter
required_parameters.description: Show urls for a specific time range, starting from yesterday going back a number of days equal to the specified period. Valid values are day, week, month with the default value of month.

optional_parameters.name: service_filter
optional_parameters.description: Show urls that were shared or clicked to/from a specific service.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://acrosticme-acrosticme-trending.p.rapidapi.com/trending/week/facebook"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "acrosticme-acrosticme-trending.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://acrosticme-acrosticme-trending.p.rapidapi.com/trending/{time_filter}/{service_filter}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "acrosticme-acrosticme-trending.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
